Achievements.Name: We Are the Champions, My Friend
Achievements.Description: Win the Tournament of Ecry.

Achievements.Name: A Templar Rides into a Forest...
Achievements.Description: Clear "Forest Roads" in any difficuty setting.

Achievements.Name: Slow and Steady
Achievements.Description: Clear "Towards the Peninsula" without losing any of the soldiers pushing the ballista.

Achievements.Name: Make the Voices Stop
Achievements.Description: Clear "The Fall of Zara" in any difficulty setting.

Achievements.Name: A Change of Perspective
Achievements.Description: Clear "The Capitolium" in any difficulty setting.

Achievements.Name: Demon Slayer
Achievements.Description: Clear "Hagia Sophia Basilica" in any difficulty setting.

Achievements.Name: Unstoppable
Achievements.Description: Perform a 50 hit combo.

Achievements.Name: End of the Chain
Achievements.Description: Perform a 100 hit combo.

Achievements.Name: Evasive Maneuvers
Achievements.Description: Dodge 30 Guard Breaks!

Achievements.Name: Deflection Master
Achievements.Description: Deflect 30 attacks with the Deflection Counter!

Achievements.Name: That Man's On Fire
Achievements.Description: Acquire the power Purifying Fire!

Achievements.Name: Roar of Flames

Achievements.Name: Maelstrom of Fire

Achievements.Name: ...And My Axe!

Achievements.Name: Overcompensating

Achievements.Description: Master the Spear!

Achievements.Name: Greek Poetry in Motion

Achievements.Description: Master the Double Sword technique!

Achievements.Name: Master of War
Achievements.Description: Master all the martial techniques!

Achievements.Name: Strong as a Spanish Cow
Achievements.Description: Enhance your character's Strength to its maximum!

Achievements.Name: Cursed and Loving It

Achievements.Name: One-Man Army

Achievements.Name: The Cursed Crusader
Achievements.Description: Clear the game on any difficulty setting.

Achievements.Name: Cross the Crosses
Achievements.Description: Find all the Blood Crucifixes!

Achievements.Description: Defend Constantinople's civilians!

Achievements.Description: Clear the game on the "Nightmare" difficulty setting,
